firstNightReminder: Dexter Drake learns an in-play character. Mark the player with that character with the "Scrap" reminder token.
otherNightReminder: Dexter Drake may guess a player. If that player has the "Scrap" reminder token, Dexter learns who the Demon is. If not, Dexter learns a player who is not the Demon.
name: Dexter Drake
ability: You start knowing an in-play character. Once per game, at night, guess what player is that character. If correct, you learn who the Demon is. If incorrect, you receive false info.

firstNightReminder: Carolyn Fern learns how many in-play characters can make players "mad" or do something in response to a player being "mad".
name: Carolyn Fern
ability: You start knowing how many "madness" related characters are in play.

name: Darrel Simmons
ability: Each night, choose a player: you learn every good character that chose them, or none if an evil player chose them.

firstNightReminder: Amandra Sharpe chooses a player. Mark the chosen player with the "Has Ability" reminder token. If the chosen player is evil, mark Amanda Sharpe with the "Drunk" reminder token.
otherNightReminder: Amandra Sharpe chooses a player. Mark the chosen player with the "Has Ability" reminder token. If the chosen player is evil, mark Amanda Sharpe with the "Drunk" reminder token.
name: Amanda Sharpe
ability: Each night, choose a player (different to last night): you gain their ability until dusk. If they are evil, you are drunk until dusk.

otherNightReminder: If Randolph Carter was "mad" that the chosen statement is true, they learn if it was. Then, Randolph chooses a statement.
name: Randolph Carter
ability: Each night, choose a statement. Tomorrow, if you are "mad" that that statement is true, you learn if it was the next night.

firstNightReminder: Agent Ari Quinn chooses a player and learns their alignment.
otherNightReminder: If Agent Ari Quinn has not broken madness, they choose a player and learn their alignment.
name: Agent Ari Quinn
ability: Each night, choose a player: you learn their alignment. Demons might register falsely to you once. If you are "mad" that you are Agent Ari Quinn, you might lose this ability.

otherNightReminder: Wake Minh Thi Phan and inform them of their number.
name: Minh Thi Phan
ability: Each night*, learn how many nominators had the same alignment as their nominees yesterday.

firstNightReminder: Evils learn that Jacqueline Fine is in play.
otherNightReminder: If no evil player was "mad" about being evil yesterday, Jacqueline Fine wakes to learn an in-play character,
name: Jacqueline Fine
ability: Each night*, if no evil player was "mad" about being evil yesterday, you learn an in-play character. Evils learn you are in play.

name: Bob Jenkins
ability: Each day, you may ask the Storyteller to tell you a piece of information about the person most "mad" about being Bob Jenkins.

firstNightReminder: Jordan Perry learns an in-play Townsfolk.
otherNightReminder: If Jordan Perry was mad that that Townsfolk is in play, they might die.
name: Jordan Perry
ability: You start knowing an in-play Townsfolk. If you are "mad" that that Townsfolk is in play, they might die.

name: Constance Dumaine
ability: You might be executed unless you are "mad" about learning something new every day. Once per game, when you visit the Storyteller, you learn a fact.

name: Harlan Earnstone
ability: If you are "mad" about being an Outsider, your townsfolk neighbours might be drunk.

firstNightReminder: Show the Grimoire for as long as Peter Warren needs. Peter Warren chooses a player and a statement.
otherNightReminder: If the previous "madness" was broken, Peter Warren learns if it became true and chooses a statement.
name: Peter Warren
ability: On your 1st night, view the Grimoire & choose a player & a statement: they are "mad" that that statement is true or you choose a new statement & it might become true (you learn if it did).

name: Dianne Divine
ability: You poison and gain the ability of the 1st in-play character that you are "mad" about being each day.

otherNightReminder: Nyarlathotep chooses a player. Then, they may choose a second player. Inform the second choice who Nyarlathotep is.
name: Nyarlathotep
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Then, once per game, choose a player: tomorrow they are "mad" that you are not the Demon or their team loses.

name: Hastur
ability: You think you are a good Townsfolk, have that ability, and register as that Townsfolk to other Hastur. Each night*, a player might die. When you die, you learn all other Hastur. [All evil players are Hastur. +1 evil]
